oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Inkubationsversuche zum Einfluss von Sorte und Textur auf den Umsatz von Lupinenkörnerschroten im Boden bei unterschiedlichen Temperaturen
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Li, Dr. Zhifang
Sabahi, Hossein
Schulz, Dr. Rudolf
Müller, Prof. Dr. Torsten
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nutrient turnover
Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organically produced legume seed meals are an upcoming alternative to established fast mineralising organic fertilisers based on plant and animal waste products with suspect origin (e.g. hornmeal). The turnover in soil was investigated with respect to the influence of legume variety and seed meal texture. Variety specific differences in net N mineralisation could be attributed to differences in C/N ratio and cellulose content. The influence of texture classes on net N mineralisation was considerably smaller than the influence of differences between the investigated species.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Li, Dr. Zhifang; Sabahi, Hossein; Schulz, Dr. Rudolf and Müller, Prof. Dr. Torsten (2009) Inkubationsversuche zum Einfluss von Sorte und Textur auf den Umsatz von Lupinenkörnerschroten im Boden bei unterschiedlichen Temperaturen. Poster at: 10. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Zürich, 11.-13. Februar 2009.
